attributes.action: include on ballot papers in all national and local elections an option to vote"none of the above candidates",and that the votes cast for this option be shown with the results.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With turnout in elections becoming lower,this would be one way of reducing apathy.Some voters feel that no candidates in a particular election represent their own views.This would enable such people to actively partipate.It can also give an opportunity for a broad level of protest to be registered by those who feel the political system is failing to engage with people.Where high levels of"none of the above"option are registered,it would concentrate the minds of those wishing to be seek office to find fresh ways of getting in touch with the electorate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
